JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: French speaking Finance Assistant to serve Geveko Markings subsidiary in France
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to be a part of a global organization? Are you motivated by structuring and optimization? And do you at the same time possess a structured and hands on approach to tasks and a passion for correct financial data? Then you might be the new Finance Assistant to serve our French Subsidiary.

About the job
Geveko Markings has a job opening for a talented and cooperative Finance Assistant who will be responsible for the daily management of the financials tasks for their subsidiary in France. The person will be an important player for the group to ensure high quality in the financial reporting and to ensure that it is delivered within the deadlines for the group. The new Finance Assistant will be responsible for ensuring compliance with the French legislation in relation to French GAAP, VAT, tax etc. in corporation with our external auditors and tax advisors.

We are offering versatile assignments within finance, where you will be able to get a full overview of the company and understanding of the business. As you will be part of a team you will of course have the support of your team in the Finance Shared Service Center in Kastrup. The team is there to assist/ train and support you with everything from the usage of the system and internal working processes.

You will be reporting to the Group Accounting Team Leader, who is located with the team in Denmark. As our new Finance Assistant you will be part of the Finance Shared Service Center (FSSC) which consists of finance, BI and IT. The position will be based in our office in Kastrup / Copenhagen.

Areas of responsibility 
Your key areas of responsibility will be as follows:
  • Daily bookkeeping and bank reconciliations
  • Assuring of compliance with the French chart of account
  • Monthly reconciliations of all balance sheet account within the group deadlines
  • VAT declarations and payments
  • Preparation of audit documentation
  • Participation of the integration of the local finance function into the group finance structure
  • Monthly analysis of OPEX, stock etc.
  • Other tasks within Group finance.

About you
You are able to work and communicate fluently in French both verbally and in writing. The position requires a hands-on person who has the strength, drive, and desire to be part of transforming the finance function to a more professional level and who can create a change of agenda in the current workflows. The right person has a high degree of structural skills, understands financial reporting and has knowledge of the details of accounting.


On top of that we imagen you to have:
  • A relevant education within Economics
  • Experience from a similar position or experience from accountancy
  • Performs well in communicating in French and English
  • Profound knowledge of IT, Excel and ERP systems as business tools
  • Experience with Microsoft D365FO is an advantage, but not a requirement.

For personal qualification we are looking for: 
  • Informal and co-operative team player with the ability to work constructively with colleagues in other countries and cultures
  • Performance-driven and with a strong problem-solving attitude - who always meet required deadlines
  • Open to change, robust and careful person who is self-motivated and thus also self-initiating
  • Ability to maintain an overview in a busy everyday life and is able to see opportunities for optimization.

For the right candidate awaits a great opportunity to be a central part of the integration of our French subsidiary into our Finance Shared Service Center.

Intrigued?
Please apply today and let us have a talk. We will review applications on an ongoing basis. 
Any questions, feel free to call Recruitment Consultant Simon Ravn at Accountor Denmark at +45 3916 0520 or Group Accounting Team Leader, Karoline Bjørnbo +45 3066 6857.

About Geveko Markings
Geveko Markings SAS formerly known Oré Peinture positioned itself as the French producer of road & urban painting. Founded in 1992, ORE was acquired by GEVEKO Markings in December 2020. 

Geveko Markings Group is a leading manufacturer and supplier of high quality and environmentally friendly road & pavement marking materials mainly used for horizontal marking of roads, cycle paths, pedestrian paths, airports, arenas, multi-story car parks, industrial locations, city centers, school playgrounds, and outdoor decorative application.

The company has a strong global footprint, operating in 80 countries through 22 offices and 11 factories around the world. Customers include road administrations, local authorities, private customers, and contractors specializing in application of road markings.
Geveko Markings is the European market leader and one of two global leaders in advanced Preformed thermoplastics road markings, which is the fastest growing road marking materials segment.

You can read more on www.geveko-markings.com
